resources.string:
" 0.9.2 - 2012-02-02:
 - New line 117 (Murviel-les-Montpellier - Montpellier)

 0.9.1 - 2012-01-30:
 - Adding line 216 (Saint-Jean-de-Védas - Béziers)
 - Bigger fonts on settings page

 0.9 - 2012-01-29:
 - 53 bus lines
 - Take holidays (zone A) and public holidays into account for schedule computation
 - Voice recognition support for searching bus stations, lines or cities
 - Support for bookmarking bus stations
 - Share schedules with friends
 - Only bus schedules for now
 - First public release "
